Package com.opentok.android.ui.textchat.widget

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TextChatFragment.TextChatListener
    An interface for receiving events when a text chat message is ready to send.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatMessage
    Defines the chat message object that you pass into the TextChatFragment.addMessage(ChatMessage msg) method.
    TextChatFragment
    A Fragment for adding and controling text chat user interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChatMessage.MessageStatus
    Defines the status of the message (whether it was a sent or received message).
